.tile-links-block{padding-top:2.5rem;padding-bottom:2.5rem}@media (min-width: 37.56rem){.tile-links-block h3{padding-bottom:1.375rem;font-size:1.375rem;margin-bottom:0}.tile-links-block ul li:last-of-type{margin-bottom:2.5rem}.tile-links-block .l-offers-layout:not(:first-child){padding-top:0.625rem}}@media (min-width: 48.1rem){.tile-links-block .l-offers-layout:not(:last-child){border-right:1px solid #d2d2d2;border-bottom:0}.tile-links-block .l-offers-layout:first-child{padding-right:4.5rem;margin-right:1.625rem}.tile-links-block .l-offers-layout:nth-child(2){padding:0 0.93rem 0 2.125rem}.tile-links-block .l-offers-layout:last-child{padding-top:0;padding-left:3.75rem}.tile-links-block{display:flex;padding-top:3.75rem;padding-bottom:3.75rem}.tile-links-block h3{margin-bottom:2rem;font-size:1.5rem}}
